text: Millenáris Sporttelep is a multi-use velodrome in Budapest, Hungary. It is currently used mostly for cycling events but has also been used for football matches. The venue has a capacity of 8,130 spectators and it opened in 1896.http://hg.hu/cikk/epiteszet/7439-velodrom-a-millenarison The track is and made of concrete. {| |Sport festival in 1928 |Running event at a sport festival in 1928 |} ==Other events== *Budapest Fringe Festival *Africa Days and Vízibility, organised by Foundation for Africa ==See also== * List of velodromes ==References== Category:Football venues in Hungary Category:Velodromes in Hungary Category:Cycle racing in Hungary Category:Sports venues in Budapest Category:1896 establishments in Hungary Category:Sports venues completed in 1896
title: Millenáris Sporttelep
